title: Draft Strategies + ADP Risers & Fallers, The Big Salad - Fantasy Football Podcast for 6/30
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, lots of fantasy questions answered! Andy and Jason discuss RB draft strategy, how to get more trade talk happening in fantasy football leagues, and lots more! Plus a new edition of Best Ball Breakdown taking a look at ADP Risers & Fallers. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for June 30th, 2022.

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit is available NOW
